name: House Kid
description:
In this GameBoy style game you play as "Alan" a young boy who is left alone in his home.

You have to move him around the house just for him to have something to eat, watch TV and don't forget let him have a bath.

But also something very sinister is coming closer to Alan so remember to follow the rules.

And never trust the shadows.

FEATURES

3 ENDINGS

GameBoy style graphics

Lore

One big shadow monster

Don't forget to support me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MrMHorrorActio1
